SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

net.philsprojects.service
Interface ServiceListener<E>

Type Parameters:
E - The event added to the service. Events added to the service are handled in the service's thread by invoking the onServiceEvent method in all attached listeners.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractService, NioWorker, OioAcceptor, OioWorker, ServiceListenerAdapter, StatService, TaskService
public interface ServiceListener<E>

A listener to events that occur within a service. All methods in a listener are invoked in the service's thread.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

Method Summary
 void onServiceEvent(Service<E> service, E event)
          The method invoked when the service is handling an event.
 void onServiceExecute(Service<E> service)
          The method invoked after the service has handled all events in the current servicing iteration.
 void onServicePause(Service<E> service, ServiceInterrupt interrupt)
          The method invoked when the service has successfully paused.
 void onServiceResume(Service<E> service, ServiceInterrupt interrupt)
          The method invoked when the service has successfully resumed.
 void onServiceStart(Service<E> service)
          The method invoked when the service thread has started and is about to begin its servicing iterations.
 void onServiceStop(Service<E> service, ServiceInterrupt interrupt)
          The method invoked when the service has successfully stopped.
 

Method Detail

onServiceEvent

void onServiceEvent(Service<E> service,
                    E event)
The method invoked when the service is handling an event. This method executes concurrently in the service's thread. This method is invoked in the beginning of a servicing iteration, before execution.

Parameters:
service - The service invoking this listener.
event - The event being handled.

onServiceExecute

void onServiceExecute(Service<E> service)
The method invoked after the service has handled all events in the current servicing iteration. This may not be called if the service is being shut down immediately.

Parameters:
service - The service invoking this listener.

onServiceStart

void onServiceStart(Service<E> service)
The method invoked when the service thread has started and is about to begin its servicing iterations. This method is only called once per time the service is started (a service can only be started if its not running at all).

Parameters:
service - The service invoking this listener.

onServicePause

void onServicePause(Service<E> service,
                    ServiceInterrupt interrupt)
The method invoked when the service has successfully paused. The next method invoked in the listener will either be stop or resume.

Parameters:
service - The service invoking this listener.
interrupt - The interrupt type given to pause the service.

onServiceResume

void onServiceResume(Service<E> service,
                     ServiceInterrupt interrupt)
The method invoked when the service has successfully resumed. The method previously invoked can only be pause.

Parameters:
service - The service invoking this listener.
interrupt - The interrupt type given to pause the service.

onServiceStop

void onServiceStop(Service<E> service,
                   ServiceInterrupt interrupt)
The method invoked when the service has successfully stopped.

Parameters:
service - The service invoking this listener.
interrupt - The interrupt type given to stop the service.
